title: Nature Domain
content: oints Heal a creature you can see No effect on undead and constructs. 18m Inflict Wounds Lv 1 Necromancy Action 3d10 Necrotic Putrefy a creature with the nectrotic energy filling your hands. Melee Protection from Evil and Good Lv 1 Abjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot Protect an ally against the attacks and powers of aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.The target can't be Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by them, and when these creatures attack it, they do so with disadv
